analysis.name: Carbon-Flutter
analysis.description: Developed a robust Flutter boilerplate utilizing the MVVM architectural pattern, providing a streamlined foundation for Flutter application development.
achievements: Engineered a comprehensive boilerplate, accelerating the development process by providing a pre-configured and organized structure for Flutter projects.
Implemented the MVVM architectural pattern, facilitating modularity, testability, and maintainability within the Flutter application.
Created a PowerShell script installer to streamline the setup and configuration process, enhancing user experience.
key_features: Provides a ready-to-use project structure adhering to the MVVM architectural pattern, promoting a clean separation of concerns.
Offers pre-configured essential packages and dependencies used for Flutter development, minimizing setup time.
Includes a PowerShell script to automate the installation and configuration of the boilerplate.
